summary: Latin America is a region in the Americas where Romance languages, like Spanish and Portuguese, are mainly spoken. It includes most of South and Central America, Mexico, and many Caribbean islands. The term was first used in the 1850s to describe countries with Latin (Romance) language roots and a shared cultural history. These countries were once colonized by France, Spain, and Portugal. Latin America is a diverse area with a rich history and a large economy, contributing significantly to the global GDP.
title: Latin America
